trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 20th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work. I went outside and looked up. I saw what looked like a brightstar that did not move. It was broad daylight and there were no clouds. Ilooked at it for about one minute. It seemed to not move, and had a small arrowlike device coming from the back. I looked away for a moment and when I lookedup again it was gone. It did not come back.
